import React, { useState } from "react"; import MainTools from "./Tools/MainTools"; import "../styles/ToolsTemplate.css"; const ToolsContext = React.createContext(null); export default function ToolsTemplate(ac) { const [switchGetAllDevicesIP, setswitchGetAllDevicesIP] = useState(false); const [switchGetAllSubnets, setswitchGetAllSubnets] = useState(true); const handleMainTools = () => { ac.dc.setswitchMainTools(true); let selectBox = document.getElementById("selectBox"); let selectedValue = selectBox.options[selectBox.selectedIndex].value; alert(selectedValue); }; const ts = { switchGetAllDevicesIP, setswitchGetAllDevicesIP, switchGetAllSubnets, setswitchGetAllSubnets, }; return (

{ac.dc.network}

Network

{ac.dc.organizationID}

Organization ID

{ac.dc.timeZone}

{ac.dc.totalDevices}

Total Devices
Select Tools
{ac.dc.switchMainTools ? :
}
); }
